title: HackTheBox Fortress: Jet
summary: Enterprise-style fortress analysis covering attack paths, privilege escalation logic, and defensive visibility considerations.

title: HTB Machine (Linux): Cobblestone
summary: Linux exploitation workflow with emphasis on enumeration decisions and detection opportunities.

title: HTB Machine (Windows): DarkZero
summary: Windows-focused attack chain analysis exploring AD behaviors and defensive telemetry insights.

title: HTB Machine (Linux): Code
summary: Python sandbox escape leading to credential recovery, SSH pivoting, and privilege escalation through sudo misconfiguration.

title: HTB Machine (Windows): Devel
summary: IIS and FTP misconfiguration allowing web shell deployment followed by kernel-level privilege escalation.

title: HTB Machine (Linux): Editor
summary: XWiki exploitation chain leveraging known vulnerabilities to achieve remote code execution and system compromise.

title: HTB Machine (Linux): Expressway
summary: VPN protocol analysis exploiting aggressive mode information disclosure to recover credentials and gain access.
